snippet: BuzzFeed announced Monday that it had raised $15.5 million in financing, less than a month after it named Ben Smith, a standout writer from Politico, as its editor in chief.
abstract: BuzzFeed announced Monday that it had raised $15.5 million in financing, less than a month after it named Ben Smith, a standout writer from Politico, as its editor in chief.
lead_paragraph: Monday brought surprises from BuzzFeed, the social Web site that is suddenly and rather robustly investing in reporting muscle.
